members.member:
The logical order of bits within a byte.
1 = MSB-to-LSB 2 = LSB-to-MSB (flipped)
Uncompressed mode flag: 1 if uncompressed, 0 if not.
EOL padding flag: 1 if fill bits have been added before an EOL such that the EOL ends on a byte boundary, 0 otherwise.
Invokes the superclass method and then sets instance variables on the basis of the metadata set on this decompressor.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.PdfViewer.PdfOutlineNode
member.summary: Represents a node in a PDF document's outline tree.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.PdfViewer.PdfPage
member.summary: Represents a page in a PDF document. Page objects contain the data needed to create visual representations of the page, which is done by the class.

member.summary: Gets the rectangle that defines the page size in Points.

member.summary: Gets a string that contains the text on the page.
member.remarks: This string is plain text. It is useful for searching and indexing.

member.summary: Converts the data in a object into a visual element that can be displayed on the screen.
